title: The data in this long table could be completely summarized in one succinct English sentence (xpost from /r/crappydesign)

duplicated_posts.title: The data in this table could be presented with much greater clarity using a single English sentence

remarks:
One sentence will be better than a long table.
Quote u/Dragonslayer: "If you live in Alaska, your delivery time might be 1-2 days, and If you live in any other state, it will take 2-7 days, of course times may vary".
